name: Association Technique de l'Industrie Européenne des Lubrifiants
goal: ATIEL represents manufacturers and marketers in the European lubricants industry. It seeks to enhance the reputation of the lubricants industry by providing expert advice to regulators, industry partners and end‐consumers and promoting superior standards of technology and lubricants performance.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Taxation
euInitiatives:
- Competition rules
- Environmental legislation: waste and eco-labelling
- Climate legislation
- Taxation
